segments.text: I see the water just cascading over the sink, creating a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk, standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman looks while all this is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside looks so peaceful, it's like a different world out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I'm just frozen watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so fascinating and strange.
segments.speaker: PAR
